document_data.name: Irim Mendar
document_data.mainbody:
'''Irim Mendar''' was a merchant from the city of [[Samargol]], [[Samarach]], ''circa'' [[1374 DR]].

{{quote|''Clever choice, traveler. Dispense with the frippery of those around youâ€”ignore their [[seagull]] cries. You want things you can use, do you not?''|Irim Mendar, the Merchant of the Realms}}
document_data.Description: Irim Mendar was a charismatic and eloquent merchant who dressed in green finery and demeaned his competitors' goods in order to prop up his own merchandise.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, Irim Mendar had a stall full of trade goods located in the [[Openpalm Bazaar]] in Samargol. He dealt in a wide variety of items, from the finest clothing to [[enchanted]] arms and armor.
